about.name: Nathalie Rautell
about.description: You either find me typing on a keyboard or at the gym somewhere between the weights. So basically I'm always building something, if not websites and applications then physical strength.

skills.skillmessage: A short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

featured.title: Movie app
featured.description: Multi-page React.js application showing data from themoviedb.org's API. The shown data is fetched from different API urls, the chosen url is based on to the user interaction

featured.title: Happy thoughts app
featured.description: React.js Twitter-like application used for fetching and posting data to an API. Used to post and like short messages.

featured.title: RSVP app
featured.description: Multi-step form built with React.js for RSVP where each question is shown in its own section and a progress bar is shown.

featured.title: Music release App
featured.description: One-page React.js application showing data from Spotify's API. The application shows new music releases and popular playlists.

featured.title: Weather app
featured.description: Weather application showing data fetched from Open Weather Map's API. The application is showing current weather and a five day forecast based on the user's current location. The application also has a darkmode depending on the current time and other CSS animations.

featured.title: Cluedo game generator
featured.description: Cluedo generator showing the user a randomized chosen weapon, murderer and room in a modal box. CSS animations is also implemented.
